Data Generation Hyperparameters
Color map:
Number of Samples: 1 <= <= 10,000
Type:
Noise: 0 <= <= 1
Factor: 0 <= <= 0.999
Class seperation: 0.1 <= <= 5
Number of classes:

Models' Hyperparameters
KNN (K Nearest Neighbours)
Number of Neighbors (k): 1 <= <= number of samples
Distance metric:
SVM (Support Vector Machine)
Kernel:
Regularization parameter (C): 0.01 <= <= 10
Kernel coefficient (gamma):
0.01 <= <= 10
Degree: 1 <= <= 10

Regularization parameter (C): 0.01 <= <= 10
L1 ratio: 0 <= <= 1

1 <= <= 100
